main event: On July 31, 1949, at Portsmouth, Virginia, a civilian reported observing six flying discs or saucers near the U.S. Naval Hospital within a time interval of five to six minutes.
interesting points: The saucers first appeared as a small white cloud, then transformed into the shape of a tulip and finally into the shape of a saucer before disappearing.
The saucers were described as dull white, not brilliant in color.
The speed and height of the saucers were unable to be estimated.
The sighting was witnessed by multiple people residing in the same apartment complex.
The information was immediately transmitted to the Office of Special Investigation at Langley Field, Virginia.
